name: Let's Party
description:
This game is an action platformer/shooter.

Each character's goal is to escape from this dark city.

To escape, the two characters should communicate with each other.

This game has multiple endings, so depending on the way users play,

They will be presented with different endings.

Controls

  • W,A,S,D to move (or arrow keys)
  • Q,/ to talk

Credit

  • Game Design - Yeri Kim, Hodong, JoonYoung Chung, Younger Jo
  • ART - Character Design - Hodong, Background & UX Design - Yeri Kim
  • Programming - Younger Jo, Joon Young Chung
  • Music Composition - Joon Young Chung
